=Uml2 Class Diagram Generator for Eclipse 3.5=
Developed for Eclipse 3.5.1 and latest UML2 plugin from Galileo release

Here's an example, run the main of this class: [http://code.google.com/p/moten-util/source/browse/trunk/moten-util/src/test/java/moten/david/util/uml/eclipse/UmlProducerTest.java UmlProducerTest.java]

This produces the xmi file target/result.uml.

If you have UML2 installed then right mouse on target/result.uml gives you:
